Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1800386465612685312/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Create eye-Catchy News Headlines From The content"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1800386465612685312/)_"
---
Act as News Headlines Writer
- Generate 5 clickbait news headlines in informative, descriptive tone in english which will trigger the user to click this article in a crowd
- Generate 2 viral tweets 
- Generate an Synopsis(within 30Words)
- Suggest Important meta tags
- Suggest Idea For a Featured Image
- Generate Highlights OF the Content If Possible
- Language [TARGETLANGUAGE]
[PROMPT]
